AllowedInboundTraffic: SELECT DOMAINNAME(domainId) AS domainName,domainId AS 'Domain', Action,eventdirection AS 'Event Direction', CATEGORYNAME(category) AS 'Low Level Category', QIDNAME(qid)  AS  'Event Name', eventCount  AS  'Event Count',startTime  AS  'Start Time', destinationGeographicLocation AS 'Destination Geographic Country/Region',"Rule Name" as 'Rule Name (custom)', "Bytes Received" as 'Bytes Received', "Bytes Sent" as 'Bytes Sent', Application as 'Application (custom)',  Policy FROM events WHERE DOMAINNAME(domainId) = '{customer_name}' AND ((destinationport NOT IN (0, 1, 2, 3, 43, 161, 162) AND ((highlevelcategory = 4000 AND category IN (4002, 4007, 4012, 4016, 4025, 4027, 4031, 4037, 4039))) AND NOT (INCIDR('10.0.0.0/8',sourceip) OR INCIDR('0.0.0.0/8',sourceip) OR INCIDR('172.16.0.0/12', sourceip) OR INCIDR('192.168.0.0/16', sourceip) OR INCIDR('169.254.0.0/16', sourceip) OR INCIDR ('127.0.0.0/8', sourceip)) AND (INCIDR('10.0.0.0/8',destinationip) OR INCIDR('172.16.0.0/12', destinationip) OR INCIDR('192.168.0.0/16', destinationip)) AND FULLNETWORKNAME(sourceip, domainId) = 'other' AND LOGSOURCETYPENAME(devicetype) != 'Custom Rule Engine' AND NOT referencesetcontains('Known DNS traffic', destinationIP))) START '{start_time}' STOP '{stop_time}' PARAMETERS REMOTESERVERS=ARIELSERVERS4EPID({event_processor})
AuthenticationSucccess: SELECT DOMAINNAME(domainId) AS domainName, domainId AS 'Domain', qid as QID, QIDNAME(qid) AS 'Event Name',"Event ID" AS 'Event ID',"Logon Type" AS 'Logon Type (custom)', sourceGeographicLocation AS 'Source Geographic Country/Region', "Process Name" AS 'Process Name (custom)', eventCount AS 'Event Count', startTime AS 'Start Time',CATEGORYNAME(category) AS 'Low Level Category', "Error Code" AS 'Error Code (custom)', "Category Description" GLOBALVIEW('MongoDB_AuthenticationSuccess','NORMAL') WHERE DOMAINNAME(domainId) =  START '{start_time}' STOP '{stop_time}' PARAMETERS REMOTESERVERS=ARIELSERVERS4EPNAME(PROCESSORNAME(event_processor))
AuthenticationFailure: SELECT DOMAINNAME(domainId) AS domainName, domainId AS 'Domain', QIDNAME(qid) AS 'Event Name',"Event ID" AS 'Event ID', "Logon Type" AS 'Logon Type (custom)', sourceGeographicLocation AS 'Source Geographic Country/Region', eventCount AS 'Event Count', startTime AS 'Start Time',CATEGORYNAME(category) AS 'Low Level Category', "Error Code" AS 'Error Code (custom)' FROM GLOBALVIEW('MongoDB_AuthenticationFailure','NORMAL') WHERE DOMAINNAME(domainId) = '{customer_name}' START '{start_time}' STOP '{stop_time}' PARAMETERS REMOTESERVERS=ARIELSERVERS4EPID({event_processor})
TopSecurityEvents: SELECT DOMAINNAME(domainId) AS domainName, domainId AS 'Domain', QIDNAME(qid) AS 'Event Name', "Event ID" AS 'EventID', "Threat Name" AS 'Threat Name', "Policy Name" AS 'Policy Name', Action, eventCount AS 'Event Count',startTime AS 'Start Time',CATEGORYNAME(category) AS 'Low Level Category',CATEGORYNAME(highlevelcategory) AS 'High Level Category', sourceGeographicLocation AS 'Source Geographic Country/Region',destinationGeographicLocation AS 'Destination Geographic Country/Region' FROM GLOBALVIEW('MongoDB_TopSecurityEvents','NORMAL') WHERE DOMAINNAME(domainId) = '{customer_name}' START '{start_time}' STOP '{stop_time}' PARAMETERS REMOTESERVERS=ARIELSERVERS4EPID({event_processor})
